title: Unable to comment in News posts
body: In the news posts, I've been trying to comment on the Ivern animation, and every time I click post says "So sad... You are not Authorized." I am already level 30 on this account and have verified my email already, so I don't know what else to do. Thanks, hope this is fixed soon.

replies.body: It could be that your Summoner and Boards profile hadn't synced until you made this post. Give it another go and let me know if you still have this issue.
Seems to have been fixed. Ty for reply.
